name: The little vampir
description: "The little vampir" is a strategic timing game. You are a vampire who wants to drink blood of beautiful princess. But you have just lost all of your dark power and became a little boy. So If you get caught by a soldier, you'll be killed immediately. Go to princess's room secretly, avoiding the eyes of soldiers!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i3+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 520M Storage: 2 GB available space
